body_html: This looks like an important bug to fix. Can you provide a pre-amble creating properly sized input tensors, like decoder_inputs_embedded, encoder_outputs, etc, using tf.ones or tf.random_..., so that I can directly replicate the issue?
body_text: This looks like an important bug to fix.  Can you provide a pre-amble creating properly sized input tensors, like decoder_inputs_embedded, encoder_outputs, etc, using tf.ones or tf.random_..., so that I can directly replicate the issue?
body: This looks like an important bug to fix.  Can you provide a pre-amble creating properly sized input tensors, like `decoder_inputs_embedded`, `encoder_outputs`, etc, using `tf.ones` or `tf.random_...`, so that I can directly replicate the issue?
